texts.name: Netsutset
texts.biography: They say that it was Netsutset who brought the ammuts to the cities. The first ammuts were summoned from some kind of terrifying realm via a dark ritual ordered by Netsutset and performed by crocodile priests. Despite their wild nature, he managed to tame and train these otherworldly beings.

specialty.description:
{Ammuts and Sun Ammuts}

Increases the Attack and Defence of any Ammuts or Sun Ammuts for each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.name: Ammuts
